question: As of February 2020, which Indian company topped the domestic market capitalisation chart?
explanation:
Reliance Industries Ltd topped the domestic market capitalisation chart with Rs. 9,42,422.58 crore. It is followed by TCS, HDFC Bank, Hindustan Unilever Ltd and HDFC.
Recently, eight of the 10 most valued Indian companies together added Rs. 1.09 trillion to their market capitalisation. Except HDFC and HDFC bank, the other top-10 companies augmented their market valuation. ICICI Bank, Bharti Airtel and Bajaj Finance in the top-10 list, increased their m-cap higher.
